activities:
Efficient Learning Systems, Inc. (ELS) (dba "CPAexcel") believes in protecting your privacy. At Efficient Learning Systems Inc. (ELS), we take your privacy seriously. Please read the following to learn more:
ELS does not rent, or sell your personal information.
ELS will not share your personal information unless ordered to by a court of law.
ELS adheres to permission-based email marketing and privacy among our partners and employees:
There are optional sections of our web site where you may register to receive information and/or email subscriptions. We ask for information such as your name, email address, mailing address, expected CPA Exam date and student status.
At any time, you may opt-out of receiving future emails of any sort from us.
If you opt-in to receiving email communications from us, then we may send information to you for the following general purposes: to fulfill your request for products and services; to email you special offers, announcements and information related to the CPA Exam; to improve our products and services; to contact you; to conduct research so that we may better understand the needs of our marketplace.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
